front.title: Public Key Cryptography Based User-to-User Authentication - (PKU2U)

abstract.t: This document defines a Generic Security Services Application ProgramInterface (GSS-API) mechanism based on Public Key Infrastructure(PKI) - PKU2U. This mechanism is based on Kerberos V messages and theKerberos V GSS-API mechanism, but without requiring a Kerberos KeyDistribution Center (KDC).
